go_data.justification: Actin is a key component of the cytoskeleton and its interactions with myosins suggest a role in cytoskeleton organization.
Actin binds to myosins, as evidenced by the acto-CcXI and acto-CbXI-1 models and the footprint analyses of the actin-binding sites.
As a component of the cytoskeleton, actin is located in the cytoplasm.
